metadata.title: CVE-2016-10153 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The crypto scatterlist API in the Linux kernel 4.9.x before 4.9.6 interactsincorrectly with the CONFIG_VMAP_STACK option, which allows local users tocause a denial of service (system crash or memory corruption) or possiblyhave unspecified other impact by leveraging reliance on earliernet/ceph/crypto.c code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10153` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.10.0-27-generic - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-4.10.0-27-generic-lpae - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-4.10.0-27-lowlatency - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
linux-image-extra-4.10.0-27-generic - 4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux-hwe package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.10.0-27.30~16.04.2').
